channel.title: danielfm on Daniel Martins
channel.description: Recent content in danielfm on Daniel Martins

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Daniel Martins and I’m a senior software engineer currently working as a Site Reliability Engineer at Jusbrasil, one of the fastest growing LawTech startups in Brazil. I’m passionate about open source software, programming languages (specially the weird ones), machine learning, and pretty much any computer science magic you might think of. I currently live in Rio de Janeiro, although I was born and grew up near SÃ£o Paulo.
